title: Sort 2
shortDescription: Take in a list of integers and print them in order.
description: Write a program that takes in integers with a max size of 10 until it takes in -1, and then prints them sorted from highest to lowest (excluding -1) seperated by commas. For example, if your program takes in 1, 2, 4, 3, and -1 it should print '4,3,2,1'.
